content:
I would like to take notes on the text Categorical Logic and Type Theory on an iPhone (iOS).

I am attempting to use Latex in a Latex editing app, but I think there could be some good, newer way to do this.

Does anyone have a recommended modern software setup for writing math notation?

I will explore using Obsidian, an excellent app. I wonder if thereâ€™s a mathematical extension to markdown supported in there.

Thanks
I think you still can't beat LaTeX for good mathematical typesetting.
